__TOC__


The way that Ubuntu looks and works can be changed in many different ways.

Kubuntu users should see CustomizeKubuntu for instructions.

* <nowiki>[[AutoLogin]]</nowiki> - Guide to set up automatic login if not set at installation.
* <nowiki>[[ChangeTimezoneHowto|Change your Time Zone]]</nowiki> - How to change the time zone on your computer.
* <nowiki>[[GrubHowto-ChangeDefaultOS|Change the default OS]]</nowiki> - Instructions on how to change which operating system is started by default, if you have more than one installed.
* <nowiki>[[UbuntuEyeCandy|Eye Candy]]</nowiki> - Information on changing the way that Ubuntu looks.
* <nowiki>[[LocalCustomisation|Local customizations]]</nowiki> - Install and configure features such as spelling dictionaries, based on your location.
* <nowiki>[[Preferences]]</nowiki> - Brief descriptions of what the items in the '''System''' -> '''Preferences''' menu are for.
* <nowiki>[[USplashCustomizationHowto|USplash Customization]]</nowiki> - Customize the boot splash screen.
